top_comment.text:
# Explanation for those who can't undrstnd korean^^ #
They decided to purchase t-shirts for themselves and their staffs. Then 
they choose brand of the t-shirts among A,B,C brand. A brand which is most 
expensive is selected. It approximately costs $850 in all. After that they 
pick the paper randomly to determine who will design the t-shirts and who 
will pay the money for that! The person who pick paper with a crown drawing 
is the designer but with a poop drawing is one who pay! The result is that 
the designer is Shindong and the payer is Eunhyuk~~!!﻿
top_comment.author: 강정민

captions.text: We decided to make customized t-shirts for our members and staffs
then, let's decide winner - the designer and loser - the payer by lots
Super Junior members 10/ Management staffs 8 / Stylist team 6 / Hair & Make up 14
Let's decide the brand first. Who wants A brand?
We have one winner and one loser
For the loser, I drew a 'something'
For the winner, I drew a crown. It's for the designer
And the designer can choose whatever he wants to be on the shirts
What if others refuse that design?
Explanation : SJ members are now drawing lots according to age order. So Leeteuk goes first and Heechul - Kangin - Shindong - Sungmin - Eunhyuk - Donghae - Siwon - Ryeowook and Kyuhyun :)
Now, it's one out of five!
Five people have picked yet still five left
No, you're not the loser. Do not pretend
So, I am the first payer for SJ t-shirts..

title: Super Junior The 7th Album ‘MAMACITA’ Music Video Event!! -  SJ Behind
